articles.title: Scientists Make Material That Can Morph Into Anything With the Pull of a String - Gizmodo
articles.description: Inspired by kirigami, a type of Japanese paper art, researchers have created a new material that transforms from a grid into any 3D structure you'd like.

articles.title: Uh Oh: Male Mosquitoes Can Feed on Our Blood, Too - Gizmodo
articles.description: The findings might overturn a widely held belief that only females pose a disease risk to people, though more research is needed.
